query:
SELECT 
    p.proname,
    pg_get_function_identity_arguments(p.oid) AS args,
    p.prosrc AS body,
    p.prosecdef AS security_definer
FROM pg_proc p
JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = p.pronamespace
WHERE n.nspname = 'public'
  AND p.proname IN (
    'pay_with_wallet',
    'credit_wallet',
    'complete_wallet_payment',
    'p2p_wallet_transfer'
  )
ORDER BY p.proname, p.oid;
